title: ScanMyReg 2.2
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $39.95 Giveaway of the day — ScanMyReg 2.2 The fastest and most effective registry optimization utility in the market User rating: 5 (71%) 2 (29%) Leave a comment 
ScanMyReg 2.2 is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now ScanMyReg 2.2 Terms and conditions 
ScanMyReg is the fastest and most effective registry optimization utility in the market. it scans the Windows registry and finds incorrect or obsolete information in the registry. By fixing these obsolete information in Windows registry, your system will run faster and error free. it also defragments the registry, keeping it streamlined for smoother system performance. The backup/restore function of the tool let you backup your whole Windows Registry so you can use it to restore the registry to the current status in case you encounter some system failure. System Requirements: 
Windows 2000/ XP (with SP2/SP3 or Home/Professional/Media Center)/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 8.1 (x32/x64) Publisher:
